title.rendered: Vijay Shankar Out of World Cup 2019 due to injury

content.rendered:
The second player to get ruled of World cup 2019

Earlier it was Shikar Dhawan and now its all-rounder Vijay Shankar has been ruled out of World Cup 2019 due to a toe injury. Vijay Shankar in a practise session got a hit by a yorker bowled by Jasprit Bumrah. To be noted that he is one of the players who took a wicket in the very first ball of his world cup. As his situation is not great to continue playing the tournament he will return home PTI quoted a senior BCCI official as saying.

Replacement of Vijay Shankar:

It’s been said that Mayank Agarwal is in the likely list of team India management. Being an opener he also can get KL Rahul back to his number 4 spot again is in case Rishabh Pant fails in next couple of games.

England vs India match 30-June:

It was a hard phase for India to lose their first match against England even though being balanced and strong in the world cup 2019. England won the match by 31 runs and 3 wickets in hand. It is worth to wait for Bangladesh vs India match on 02-July-2019. So far India had played 6 out of which they lost only 1 in other hands Bangladesh who have played 6 matches lost 3 and won 3.

NOTE: Try fantasy cricket and get to know your cricket skills.

5 / 5 ( 1 vote )
